archimate:Plateau.name: OO 7: MainCam Phase 2 (Plateau)
archimate:Plateau.documentation: The main Cam Phase 2 Plateau Builds on the Main Cam Phae 1 Bundel by adding the resources needed to perform real-tiem production of Alerts. By this time, the alert distibution system which routes rea tiem events to the brokers ahs been constructre and has been exercised in offline mode.
